HELP_INFO.TITLE: Hi there, I'm Aaron Tyler, A Newbie Telegram - Discord Bot
HELP_INFO.DESCRIPTION:
You can control me at a time both from Telegram and Discord (for limited commands only)

You can control me using following commands:
HELP_INFO.COMMANDS:
/picture - sends you a dummy picture
/location - sends you a dummy location, for now statue of liberty
/keyboard - shows up a markup keyboard, I can use it for further features
/youtube - gives a simple link as per your search query
/github - shows all the repository (or) commits info from the <username> and <repo> you provide me

Happy botting user..!
